intent_atoms.description: Provide operators a dedicated Integrity tab that consolidates all recorded ParseIssue entries into a sortable, filterable table and exposes exports so they can triage corruption without scanning the outline manually.
The SwiftUI tab layout must be finished with severity sort/filter controls synchronized with ribbon and detail pane counts.
Row selection in the Integrity tab must bind to the outline/detail focus APIs introduced during T3.3–T3.5 so navigation remains contextual.
The Share menu must be wired to the refreshed plaintext and JSON exporters now shipping in T4.2.

functional_units.name: Integrity Summary Tab UI
functional_units.description: A SwiftUI tab that displays a sortable and filterable table of all recorded ParseIssue entries.

functional_units.name: Severity Sort/Filter Controls
functional_units.description: Controls that allow users to sort or filter issues by severity, synchronized with ribbon and detail pane counts.

functional_units.name: Row Selection Binding
functional_units.description: Binding of table row selection to the outline/detail focus APIs for contextual navigation.

functional_units.name: Share Menu Integration
functional_units.description: A Share menu that exposes plaintext and JSON export options for the issue summary.

functional_units.name: Plaintext Issue Exporter
functional_units.description: An exporter that outputs the integrity summary in plaintext format, as defined in T4.2.

functional_units.name: JSON Issue Exporter
functional_units.description: An exporter that outputs the integrity summary in JSON format, as per T‑ ..
